LanguageData.TKKN_ColdSpring.label: Cold Spring
LanguageData.TKKN_ColdSpring.description: Very cold water from under the earth. The water keeps the air around it cool.
LanguageData.TKKN_DustDevil.label: dustdevil
LanguageData.TKKN_HotSpring.label: Hot Spring
LanguageData.TKKN_HotSpring.description: Water naturally heated by the earth. The water has healing properties.
LanguageData.TKKN_Lava_Spring.label: Lava Eruption
LanguageData.TKKN_Lava_Spring.description: Spews molten lava, which hardens into lava rock.
LanguageData.TKKN_OasisSpring.label: Oasis
LanguageData.TKKN_OasisSpring.description: Very cold water from under the earth. The water keeps the air around it cool.
LanguageData.TKKN_RedwoodDead.label: redwood
LanguageData.TKKN_RedwoodDead.description:
A huge, dead tree. Its roots are shallow, and when it gets too large, it topples over.
Yeilds red wood, which is valuable and rare.
LanguageData.TKKN_Sculpture_Shell.label: sea shell
LanguageData.TKKN_Sculpture_Shell.description: The beautiful, hard, protective shell of long dead sea animals.
LanguageData.TKKN_SteamGenerator.label: steam generator
LanguageData.TKKN_SteamGenerator.description: Produces electricity from steam vents in lava fields. Must be placed on a steam vent.
LanguageData.TKKN_SteamVent.label: steam vent
LanguageData.TKKN_SteamVent.description: Temporary natural steam source from lava rock.
